segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the woman polishing that plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her apron, looking every bit the dutiful homemaker.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window behind her shows a peaceful garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, things are a mess with water gushing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear it or feel the puddle at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's wasteful and dangerous; the cabinets are getting soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, those children behind her are climbing on an unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretching way up to grab cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just waiting expectantly, like it's all a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're risking a fall for some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is frustrating; someone needs to intervene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm outside makes it even more irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to what's happening?
segments.speaker: PAR
